extendedInfo.description: This great and useful NEW app is for all you Football players or parent of football players of any age. Stat Tracker keeps an overall record of all the stats that you input. No matter what your position you can record your stats in this easy to use app. You want to share your amazing stats with others? On any of the view pages simply click the Copy to Clipboard button and now you can paste your stats in any Edit Text box. This includes posting it in text messages, in email, and yes even posting it on Facebook. Don't go through your Football season without this app! You will regret not having it.If you have any questions, comments, concerns, suggestion, or you just want to brag about your stats... send me an email and I will respond. If you notice any bugs within the stats or any problems at all please don't hesitate to send me an email so I can fix it right away for you. Is it missing a stat? Let me know what stat and it will be updated promptly.TAGS: football, sports, baseball, basketball, soccer, field, goal, qb, quarterback, stat, stats, statistics, track, trak, season, tackle, new, hot, helpful(c) 2011 Fallacy Studios. All Rights Reserved.

reviews.title: Works ok
reviews.comment: But you need to be able to break yards down more granualer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poorly Thouhgt Out App
reviews.comment: Basically, you enter all your stats for one game at a time after that game is complete. Still requires you to track stats somewhere else then input all stats into this app. This should be a per play/per game stat tracker. It would be much more useful if it was designed this way.
reviews.author: A Google User
